ğŸŒˆ Intro

Arco Toolbox is a Figma plug-in jointly launched by Bytedance GIP UED team and the Infrastructure FrontEnd team. It is a design tool to help designers and developers improve efficiency in daily workflow. It includes the key functionalities: Components, Tokens, Iconbox, and Palette.


Components: Quickly define component styles and know how to use them

Tokens: View the global style of the theme and design Tokens at a glance

Iconbox: Compressive collection of icons for use with a single drag and drop, supporting online adjustment and flexible configuration.

Palette: Powerful color algorithm to create and customize your Palette with ease

Welcome to use the Arco Toolbox ,we look forward to your valuable suggestionsï½
